Name: Indirection
About the game: With Indirection , there is no going back, literally! With only one direction to move in, how will you get around? Luckily, the massive testing facility you find yourself in has a solution for that! Features 16 challenging campaign levels with mind bending direction-based puzzles. Steam workshop support with an infinite number of fan-created levels! Built-in level editor to create your own puzzles! Gameplay Increasingly complex levels where you need to learn to think - one way or another. Use swap machines to change your direction. Jump through portals to teleport across the level. Switch machines on and off to get through complex puzzles. Difficult tests of platforming skill in every level!
